Class playn.core.Game

Changed from an interface to a class.

Added Constructors
Game(Platform, int) Creates a clocked game with the desired simulation update rate, in ms.
 

Removed Methods
void init() Called once on initialization.
void tick(int) Called on every frame tick, is responsible for performing all game logic and scene graph updates.
 

Added Methods
void paint(Clock) Called on every frame.
void update(Clock) Called on every simulation update.
 

Added Fields
Signal<Clock> paint A signal emitted on every frame.
Platform plat The platform on which this game is running.
Signal<Clock> update A signal emitted on every simulation update.
